title: [Placements] Is anybody maintaining a sheet for the 2026 placement updates?
content: Curious about the placements of the 2026 batch, do share if exists

comments.body: Can someone tell me whether cnr and mrd scholarships are given to top x% students of their particular branch or to whole btech 1year students....like x% students from each branch ...or X% of total btech students
u/rowlet-owl still joining pes so had a doudt
1st and 2nd sem will be according to your cycle, it'll be x% of students from physics cycle and x% from chem cycle
Bruh it just started 5 days ago and u want sheet
It'll be department wise afaik,CSE, AIML,ECE etc
Bruh for our batch by this time multiple companies had come already at least 7-8, if no one's keeping a sheet then that's cooked lmao
Only 1 interview has happened till now , for others only OAs
Around 14-15 companies have come, and 2 of them have recruited till now. The rest of them are still in the process of shortlisting and conducting OAs
